original: intros f x y H. unfold continuity_2d_pt. intros eps. unfold locally_2d. intros. unfold continuity_2d_pt in H. destruct H as [lx [ly Hlim]]. specialize (Hlim eps). unfold locally in Hlim. apply Hlim in H0. destruct H0 as [delta [Hdelta1 Hdelta2]]. exists delta. intros u v H1 H2 H3 H4. apply Hdelta2. split. - rewrite Rminus_0_r. apply Hdelta1. unfold ball. simpl. rewrite Rminus_0_r in H1. rewrite Rminus_0_r in H2. apply H1. - rewrite Rminus_0_r. apply Hdelta1. unfold ball. simpl. rewrite Rminus_0_r in H3. rewrite Rminus_0_r in H4. apply H3.
